content:
Inspiration comes alive at Ka'ana, a luxe adventure outpost
where wandering spirits roam free. Nestled in the heart of the
tropical jungle of western Belize, our luxury resort is an oasis
of style, culture, and premium amenities for well-seasoned
adventurers and tastemakers alike. At Ka'ana, we offer
luxury accommodations, adventure tours, and all-inclusive
packages. Our resort in San Ignacio, Belize, is at the
doorstep of an ancient Maya city and has been inspired by
Ka'ana's name, which means heavenly place.
subtitle: K'AANA IS BUILT FOR ADVENTURES
title: A Nature-Inspired Resort in Belize
